A balance is needed to ensure survival without overexerting myself.

I chose this theta because the sheep population has decreased, indicating a potential scarcity of food. By lowering my hunting intensity, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves, while still being able to hunt effectively if the opportunity arises. This balanced approach helps ensure my survival in a challenging environment.
